product_name: ExOfficio Sol Cool Shirt - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Feel instantly cooler when you don the women's ExOfficio Sol Cool Shirt with Icefil(R) technology. It also protects from harmful sun, so pack it for your next summer hike or trip to the tropics! Icefil(R) fabric uses Xylitol, a natural plant compound, to create a cooling sensation on contact with moisture that lowers body temperature up to 5 degrees. Lightweight fabric also wicks moisture, dries fast and resists odor. Offers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection from harmful UV rays. Shoulder seams are moved forward for comfort under pack straps. ExOfficio Sol Cool Shirt features underarm gussets that free up arm movements. Closeout.
short_description: Feel instantly cooler when you don the women's ExOfficio Sol Cool Shirt with Icefil(R) technology. It also protects from harmful sun, so pack it for your next summer hike or trip to the tropics!
